name: GCF - LCM Calculator
description: GCF - LCM Calculator is a convenient tool that helps you calculate the Greatest Common Factor (GCF) and the Least Common Multiple (LCM) between two or many numbers.  - Features: + Lightweight and works fast, able to copy output. + Nice and modern interface, allow choosing light theme or dark theme. + Simple and easy to use.  - Instruction: just type the integers separated by spaces or commas then the result will appear simultaneously.  Wish it would help your work!  GCF - LCM Calculator - Developed by Universapp
